Directory.Read.All.plainEnglish: Read all data in the directory
abuseScenarios: Enumerate all users, groups, and roles in the tenant
Map organizational structure for targeted attacks
Identify privileged accounts and service accounts
Directory.Read.All.adminImpactNote: Grants read access to the entire Azure AD directory

Directory.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write all data in the directory
abuseScenarios: Modify user attributes and group memberships
Create backdoor accounts with elevated privileges
Change service principal configurations to maintain persistence
Directory.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Full read-write access to Azure AD — highest risk permission

User.Read.plainEnglish: Sign in and read the signed-in user's profile

abuseScenarios: Harvest email addresses, phone numbers, and job titles for social engineering
Identify employees with access to sensitive systems
User.Read.All.adminImpactNote: Access to profiles of all users in the organization

User.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write all users' full profiles
abuseScenarios: Reset passwords to take over user accounts
Modify MFA settings to bypass authentication
Change user attributes to escalate privileges
User.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Can modify any user account including admin accounts

abuseScenarios: Read all emails in user mailboxes
Extract sensitive business information, credentials, or PII
Monitor for MFA codes and password reset emails
Mail.Read.adminImpactNote: When granted as application permission, reads all mailboxes in the tenant

Mail.ReadWrite.plainEnglish: Read and write access to user mail
abuseScenarios: Read, send, and delete emails on behalf of users
Create mail rules to silently forward emails externally
Delete evidence of compromise
Mail.ReadWrite.adminImpactNote: Full access to user mailboxes including deletion

abuseScenarios: Send phishing emails from legitimate user accounts
Impersonate executives for BEC attacks

Files.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write files in all site collections
abuseScenarios: Access and exfiltrate all SharePoint and OneDrive files
Implant malicious files in shared drives
Delete or encrypt files for ransomware
Files.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Full access to all files across the entire organization

Files.Read.All.plainEnglish: Read all files that the user can access
abuseScenarios: Exfiltrate sensitive documents and intellectual property
Access confidential financial records and HR data

Sites.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Edit or delete items in all site collections
abuseScenarios: Access all SharePoint content across the organization
Modify or delete critical business documents
Upload malicious content to SharePoint
Sites.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Full access to all SharePoint sites

Sites.FullControl.All.plainEnglish: Full control of all site collections
abuseScenarios: Complete control over all SharePoint sites including settings
Delete entire site collections
Sites.FullControl.All.adminImpactNote: Admin-level control over all SharePoint content

abuseScenarios: Modify app registrations to add malicious redirect URIs
Add credentials to existing high-privilege applications
Create new backdoor applications with elevated permissions
Application.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Can modify any application registration in the tenant — enables persistence

abuseScenarios: Enumerate all registered applications to find attack targets
Identify high-privilege apps that could be compromised

AppRoleAssignment.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write all app role assignments
abuseScenarios: Grant high-privilege app roles to malicious service principals
Remove security-critical role assignments
AppRoleAssignment.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Can modify who has what application permissions

DelegatedPermissionGrant.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write all delegated permission grants
abuseScenarios: Grant any delegated permission to any application without user consent
Bypass consent policies
DelegatedPermissionGrant.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Can grant arbitrary delegated permissions to applications

RoleManagement.ReadWrite.Directory.plainEnglish: Read and write all directory RBAC settings
abuseScenarios: Add any user or service principal to the Global Administrator role
Create custom privileged roles
Completely take over the Azure AD tenant
RoleManagement.ReadWrite.Directory.adminImpactNote: Can grant Global Admin — highest possible risk

abuseScenarios: Map all privileged accounts and role assignments
Identify targets for privilege escalation

GroupMember.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write all group memberships
abuseScenarios: Add self to privileged groups (e.g., Global Admins)
Remove users from security groups to disrupt access controls
GroupMember.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Can add principals to any group including privileged ones

abuseScenarios: Modify group settings and memberships
Create groups for unauthorized resource access
Enumerate security groups to identify privileged users
Map organizational structure
Disable Conditional Access policies
Weaken authentication policies to bypass MFA
Modify token lifetime policies to extend session persistence
Policy.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Can modify security policies affecting the entire tenant

abuseScenarios: Monitor security investigations to evade detection
Track which activities are being audited

PrivilegedAccess.ReadWrite.AzureAD.plainEnglish: Read and write privileged access to Azure AD roles
abuseScenarios: Activate privileged roles for unauthorized accounts
Extend privileged access duration
PrivilegedAccess.ReadWrite.AzureAD.adminImpactNote: Controls PIM (Privileged Identity Management) for Azure AD

RoleAssignmentSchedule.ReadWrite.Directo.plainEnglish: Read and write all role assignment schedules
abuseScenarios: Schedule privileged role activations for later
Create persistent privileged access

EntitlementManagement.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write entitlement management resources
abuseScenarios: Manipulate access packages to grant unauthorized resource access
Bypass access review processes

Chat.Read.All.plainEnglish: Read all chat messages in Teams
abuseScenarios: Read all Teams messages including private conversations
Extract sensitive business information, credentials, or PII shared over Teams
Chat.Read.All.adminImpactNote: Application permission — reads all chats in the organization

abuseScenarios: Read all channel messages across all Teams
Extract internal communications
Modify team settings and memberships
Add bots or connectors to teams for ongoing access

SecurityEvents.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and update your organization's security events
abuseScenarios: Read all security alerts — understand what the SOC is investigating
Dismiss security alerts to cover tracks

SecurityActions.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and update your organization's security actions
abuseScenarios: Trigger or cancel security response actions
Read live threat intelligence

DeviceManagementApps.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write Microsoft Intune apps
abuseScenarios: Deploy malicious applications to all managed devices
Modify app configuration profiles
DeviceManagementApps.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Can deploy software to all Intune-managed devices

DeviceManagementConfiguration.ReadWrite..plainEnglish: Read and write Microsoft Intune device configuration
abuseScenarios: Weaken device security baselines
Enable remote access or disable endpoint protection
DeviceManagementConfiguration.ReadWrite..adminImpactNote: Can modify device security policies for all managed devices

DeviceManagementManagedDevices.ReadWrite.plainEnglish: Read and write Microsoft Intune devices
abuseScenarios: Wipe or retire managed devices
Unenroll devices from management
Access usage reports that may contain user activity information
Identify high-value targets based on activity patterns

AccessReview.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write all access reviews
abuseScenarios: Approve unauthorized access review decisions
Manipulate access review results to maintain unauthorized access
Read calendar entries to understand executive schedules
Create fake meeting invites for phishing
Harvest contact information for social engineering
Modify contacts to redirect communications
Read task lists that may contain sensitive project information

MailboxSettings.ReadWrite.plainEnglish: Read and write user mailbox settings
abuseScenarios: Configure email forwarding rules to external addresses
Set out-of-office to harvest intelligence about targets
Block security alert emails
Access recordings of all Teams meetings including executive meetings
Extract sensitive business discussions
OnlineMeetingRecording.Read.All.adminImpactNote: Application permission — accesses all meeting recordings

ThreatIndicators.ReadWrite.OwnedBy.plainEnglish: Read and write threat indicators on behalf of the app
abuseScenarios: Modify threat intelligence indicators to evade detection
Create false positive alerts

ProgramControl.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write all access review programs
abuseScenarios: Manipulate program structures governing access reviews

offline_access.plainEnglish: Maintain access to data you have given access to
abuseScenarios: Obtain refresh tokens for persistent, long-lived access
Access data even after the user's session expires
offline_access.adminImpactNote: Enables long-lived token access — risk depends on accompanying scopes

ServicePrincipalEndpoint.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write service principal endpoints
abuseScenarios: Modify service principal endpoints to intercept authentication flows
Add attacker-controlled domain to the tenant for identity spoofing
Modify federated domain configuration for authentication bypass
Domain.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Can add domains to the tenant — enables identity spoofing attacks

abuseScenarios: Modify tenant-level security settings
Change organization branding for phishing

ConditionalAccess.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write conditional access policies
abuseScenarios: Disable all Conditional Access policies
Create exclusion rules to bypass MFA requirements
Allow access from untrusted locations or devices
ConditionalAccess.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Can disable all Conditional Access policies — disables key security controls

abuseScenarios: Obtain BitLocker recovery keys for all managed devices
Enable unauthorized physical access to encrypted drives

UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write all users' authentication methods
abuseScenarios: Register attacker-controlled MFA devices for any user
Remove existing MFA methods to bypass multi-factor authentication
Take over any user account by modifying authentication methods
UserAuthenticationMethod.ReadWrite.All.adminImpactNote: Can add MFA devices to any account including Global Admins

TeamMember.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Add and remove members from all teams
abuseScenarios: Add malicious users or bots to any team
Remove legitimate members from critical teams

ChannelSettings.ReadWrite.All.plainEnglish: Read and write the settings of all channels
abuseScenarios: Modify channel settings to enable unauthorized access
